# dwctaxr

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of dwctaxr is to facilitate working with Darwin Core Taxon data.

## Installation

You can install the released version of dwctaxr from [CRAN](https://CRAN.R-project.org) with:

``` r
install.packages("dwctaxr")
```
